 2A small `pdoc` example.

 5class Dog:
 6    """üêï"""
 7    name: str
 8    """The name of our dog."""
 9    friends: list["Dog"]
10    """The friends of our dog."""
11
12    def __init__(self, name: str):
13        """Make a Dog without any friends (yet)."""
14        self.name = name
15        self.friends = []
16
17    def bark(self, loud: bool = True):
18        """*woof*"""
